concept.title: Sequence
concept.shortdesc: A contiguous series of server calls starting with a first server call and ending after 30 minutes of activity.

conbody.p: [rename to visit] The sequence ends when a variable value (such as page name = Sports Home) is overwritten by another variable value (such as page name = Money Home).
In this example, viewing the Sports Home page begins the sequence, and viewing the Money Home ends it. Server calls, such file downloads or video views, do not interrupt the sequence.
